oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "It's Your Fault!"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Economy, Businesses
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capitalist sitting on price gouges and product surplus scolding a family with newspaper clippings regarding company profits in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
